awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Irreducible Characters of Infinite   Dimensional Lie Algebras
awd_abstract_narration: One of the fundamental problems in Lie theory is the                       determination of the weight multiplicities of the irreducible                   highest weight representations of a Lie algebra.  The generating                function of the multiplicities is called the character of the                   representation.  This project will consider characters of the                   irreducible highest weight representations of certain infinite                  dimensional Lie algebras and superalgebras.  Specifically, the                  principal investigator will examine these characters for affine                 Lie algebras, Virasoro algebras, the Neveu-Schwarz algebras and                 the Ramond algebras.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
